The Cheerlux C10 is a multifunctional LED WiFi projector that will enhance your viewing experience. Its LCD technology ensures beautiful and crisp graphics with a base resolution of 1280 x 720 and compatibility with 1080P HD. With a contrast ratio of 1500:1 and a brightness of 2600 Lumens, this projector produces vivid and lifelike images. With its 2.4GHz operation, wireless technology offers practical communication choices. The picture size covers from 50 to 120 inches with an aspect ratio of 16:9 or 4:3, and the projection distance varies from 1 to 5 meters, providing versatility in arrangement. With multiple interface options (3.5mm Audio, AV, HDMI, and USB), the Cheerlux C10 is compatible with a wide range of devices. Long-term use is guaranteed by the LED lamp's remarkable 50,000-hour lifespan. cat_seo_title: Cheerlux Projector Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Cheerlux Projectors at best price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Cheerlux C12 3600 Lumens Full HD WiFi LED Projector

The Cheerlux C12 is a smart and powerful projector that offers a large and clear screen with wireless connectivity. The WiFi Projector has an LCD technique to deliver bright and vivid colors. It has a natural resolution FHD 1920 x 1080 and 16:9 aspect ratio, suitable for most movies and videos. The Cheerlux C12 LED Projector has a 3600 luminance brightness to ensure a bright and clear image even in a dark room. It has a white color temperature of 8000K, which creates a natural and comfortable viewing experience. The Cheerlux C12 3600 Lumens LED Projector has an F135 lens, high light transmittance, and low distortion. It has a throw ratio of 1.35, which means it can project a large screen over a short distance. The Cheerlux LED Projector can project a size of 50–170 inches, ideal for home theater, gaming, and presentations. It has a throw distance of 1.5–4.8 m, giving you flexibility and convenience in placing the device. It has a manual focus and a manual keystone correction, which allow you to adjust the image quality and angle easily. The Cheerlux C12 3600 Lumens WiFi Projector has a main interface of AV/Earphone Jack/HDMI/USB, which enables you to connect various devices and sources. The LED projector also has a WiFi option, which supports 2.4/5G frequencies. You can connect the device to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop wirelessly and stream your favorite content. Their LED lamp house has a 10000LM bulb luminance and a light work life of 50000 hours. The LED lamp is energy-saving and long-lasting, and it does not harm your eyes. The device has a master chip of 6710/V53, which is a powerful and stable processor that ensures smooth and fast performance.

The Cheerlux C50 3800 Lumens Wi-Fi Projector has a native resolution of 1080p (Full HD) and can handle up to 4K resolution, making it ideal for use as a home theater projector. The Cheerlux C50 is ideal for watching movies. The image is clear and the colors are vibrant.

Wireless Screen Mirroring/Display

The Cheerlux C50 may operate as a wireless display for your phone when both devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. It can connect to a 5GHz Wi-Fi network for a more dependable and faster wireless display connection.

Bluetooth 5.0 Pairing

The Cheerlux C50 may also connect wirelessly to your existing speaker or headphones over Bluetooth 5.0 with no latency. Connect your phone to the projector through Bluetooth in Bluetooth receiver mode, and utilize the Cheerlux C50 projector's built-in sound as a Bluetooth speaker. Cheerlux C50 may be positioned at any angle and still project straight thanks to digital keystone adjustment. It has 01 Year Service Warranty.

Compact & Portable
